Name: Molten Mail
Title: Emperor of Fire and Iron: Molten Mail
Desc: "Imagine this world: All of humanity has been purged from Teyvat, and the ever-growing Emperor of Fire and Iron eventually wears the Palais Mermonia upon its body like a luxurious coat of white stone."
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Emperor of Fire and Iron at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

Talent.Name: Molten Mail
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When played:</color> Apply $[K203] to the <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2304]</color> with this card equipped.\nAfter your $[K6] Status other than $[K1023] or $[K6] Combat Status is removed: The $[A2304] with this card equipped gains 2 stacks of $[K1023]. (Once per Round)\n(You must have $[A2304] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K203.Name: <color=#FF9999FF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro Application</color>
K203.Desc:
When {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro is applied without dealing any DMG, the Elemental Reaction triggered will ignore DMG-dealing effects:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melt</color>: No effect
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: No effect
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: The target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning</color>: Creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame</color>] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

K6.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color>
K6.Desc: This Shield will be consumed to protect the character who equips it from DMG.

K1023.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Armored Crab Carapace</color>
K1023.Desc: Each stack provides 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> to protect the equipped character.
